title: Interpretation of a dream about a dog bite

preview.html: Here is the interpretation of a dog bite in a dream and its meaning whether the dreamer is a man or a married or single woman, and we will also explain the interpretation of a dog bite depending on the point of the bite and the attack. Interpretation of a dream about a dog bite: A dog in general in a dream can be a good sign for the dreamer, the beginning of gaining a new source of livelihood, and a solution to problems. As for your dog biting you in a dream, this is not a good dream. It indicates vice and trouble, whether for a man or a woman, whether she is married or not. Single. But always remember that in every evil there is good that we do not know. Interpretation of a dog bite for a man. Seeing a dog in general for a man in a dream is evidence of goodness. It could be a new job or marriage. In general, it is good news for him. When a man sees that a dog has Bite him, this is a warning to him that there are some hypocrites around him or that an evil person in his life will have evil. This may indicate that someone is trying to take your money. Seeing a man bite a dog could be an indication that the dreamer is committing sins and causing disturbance. Or evidence However, the dreamer will be exposed to some troubles and problems and will be exposed to a lack of livelihood. If a man sees that he is attacked by a large number of words, this is evidence of lack of nutrition and poverty. If a dog attacks a man, he should be careful, as it is evidence of the presence of an evil woman in his life. Seeing a dog biting him in bed is a sign of betrayal. Marital. Many dogs in the house are a sign of loss of grace from this house. Also, the more dogs, this is a sign of the shortness of the dreamer’s life. Interpretation of a dream about a dog biting a single womanSeeing a dog in a dream for a single girl can be a good thing, but a bite A dog in a dream has unpleasant connotations that vary depending on the details of the dream and lie in: When one girl sees a dog standing in a dream. This is evidence of the presence of an evil woman in her life and her closeness to evil. It may be a sign of the presence of a corrupt and evil man who wants to marry her or wants to work. With her, so she must be careful. This is evidence of the presence of people from Around her they talk badly about her. Also a dog bites a married woman. It may be a sign of a bad friend in her life that she should be careful of. title: Interpretation of a dream about ears from inside a cell in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about ears from inside a cell in a dream: A cell in a dream symbolizes compatibility, but what does it mean to see ears from inside a cell in a dream? Let us know that now through the following lines in detail. Interpretation of a dream about ears through a cell in a dream If the sleeper sees in his dream that he is calling for a cell, this is a sign of freedom. This vision also indicates the disappearance of tension and the end of the problems that the dreamer is facing in the current period. And begging in The bed is evidence of the dreamer's death, and God knows best. While hearing the call to prayer from an enemy is evidence of the accusations directed at the dreamer. This is God, the Most High, the All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about ears on a neighbor’s roof in a dream: If the sleeper sees in his dream that he is calling on his neighbor’s roof, then this is evidence that the dreamer is betraying his neighbor, may God preserve his dignity. But if the sleeper sees in his dream that he is calling on the roof of his house, then this is evidence The death of a person inside that house...and God knows best. The call to prayer inside the house is evidence of the dreamer’s desire to end his marital problems with his wife. The call to prayer on the walls is evidence that the dreamer is calling on the disputing parties to reconcile. Interpretation of a dream in front of the king’s palace in a dream. If the sleeper sees in his dream that he is calling In front of the ruler’s palace, this is evidence that he is the one who says the trend. This vision shows that the dreamer fears only God and speaks the truth in the face of the ruler. But if he sees that he is on the call, then he changes the method of the call, then this is evidence of injustice to the people. The call to prayer in front of a lighthouse in a dream A praiseworthy vision shows that people are praying on the path of guidance and this vision indicates a visit to the Sacred House of God soon. Interpretation of a dream about the call to prayer in the mosque with a beautiful voice in a dream. If a married woman sees in her dream that she hears the call to prayer with a beautiful voice, this is an indication of the great source of wealth that she will soon acquire. If the sleeper sees in his dream that he is calling inside the mosque while in reality he is not working as a muezzin, then this is a welcome vision, as this vision indicates the acquisition of a high status. If the dreamer is a merchant, then this is an indication of great profits and an expansion in trade. Seeing the call to prayer from a distant well is evidence of... That the dreamer helps people travel...and God is All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about a small child in a dream. If the sleeper sees in his dream that there is a small child calling for prayer and knowing about it, this is an indication that the child’s parents are falsely accused. This vision indicates that this child will be the reason for his parents’ acquittal Among these charges: Hearing the call to prayer in a beautiful voice in an ordinary girl’s dream is a sign of goodness and life. Hearing the call to prayer in the house is evidence of the death of someone inside that house. And God knows best. Interpretation of dreams: I dreamed that I was calling him in a dream. If the sleeper sees in his dream that he is calling for prayer, then this is one of the good visions that convey good news. If the sleeper sees that he called twice and then prayed, then this is good news that he will perform Hajj this year. But if he sees that he is standing in... A high generation then prayed and prayed, as this is evidence of the high position that the dreamer will occupy among the people. It is possible that this vision indicates that the dreamer is gaining an important and famous position...and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If the dreamer raises his p.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a crocodile according to Ibn Sirin and al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a crocodile by Ibn Sirin. Whoever dreams of dragging a crocodile into the sea will destroy his enemies. Whoever dreams of eating crocodile meat, this is a sign of abundance of money. Whoever sees in a dream that crocodile has a suffix, this is an indication of the resurrection of some mistakes that he did not admit to. The crocodile inside the dream: elements of failure and loss In which the dreamer. A crocodile in a dream is a sign of a deceitful merchant. Whoever sees a crocodile being lured into the sea falls prey to some thieves. Killing a crocodile in a dream is a sign of kindness and fulfillment of desires. A crocodile in a dream often indicates getting rid of enemies. Whoever sees a crocodile in a dream He speaks well, this indicates that there is someone near him, but he is deceitful. Anyone who plans to travel and sees a crocodile in a dream, this indicates that there will be some difficulties during this trip. Interpretation of a dream about a crocodile for a single woman. The only woman who sees a crocodile in the dream. If she can escape from this, then she She will succeed in her life. Killing one crocodile in a dream is a sign of success and superiority. Interpretation of a dream about a crocodile for a married woman. If a married woman sees a crocodile in a dream and is not harmed by it, this is evidence that she will be free of problems and dangers. A married woman who sees a crocodile in a dream indicates some situations Which you are afraid of. Interpretation of a dream about a crocodile according to Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi sees that a crocodile in a dream indicates immorality and immorality. Whoever sees that the crocodile threw him into the sea, this is evidence that someone attacked him and took over the house. And whoever sees that he benefits from crocodile fat, this is a sign of victory over enemies. And receiving money from them. Whoever was bitten by a crocodile in a dream, this indicates the harm that the fortuneteller will suffer. Whoever sees that the crocodile is chasing him at home, this is a sign that he will have some problems with his parents. Whoever sees a dead crocodile in a dream, this is a sign of the presence of some evil people in his life. The dreamer. Interpretation of a dream about a crocodile for a pregnant woman. Seeing a crocodile in a dream indicates a male child. If a pregnant woman sees that a crocodile is attacking her, this indicates that she will get rid of pregnancy problems and the birth will be easy. Add the dream that you would like to interpret in a comment below the article and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Interpretation of an absolute vision in a dream in detail

preview.html: Seeing a divorced woman in a dream symbolizes fatigue and sadness, and whoever sees his divorced wife in a dream, this indicates the return of communication with her or the recovery of memories. If you see a divorced woman whom you know in a dream, this indicates her need for help and assistance, and dreaming of a quarrel with a divorced woman indicates demanding rights and rights. God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a divorced woman in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a divorced woman in a dream means sadness and illness, and it can indicate the obstruction of things and facing problems and difficulties. Whoever sees a divorced woman sad in a dream, this means that he is experiencing great sadness and great delusion, and if you see a divorced woman crying a lot in a dream, This means it falls. In misfortunes without finding a way out of them, and you see a divorced woman smiling at you. The dream indicates the improvement of conditions and the removal of problems. To dream of a divorced woman who is angry with you indicates the turmoil in your condition, and hearing the screams of a divorced woman in a dream indicates distress and the need for help. Al-Nabulsi says that the return of the divorced woman in a dream indicates the safety of the patient or his return to his religion, sect, or profession. Refusing to return the divorced woman in a dream indicates despair about something. This dream indicates the pursuit of justice among people. The engagement of a divorced woman in a dream indicates renewed hopes and efforts, and dreaming of a divorced woman marrying a married man suggests that you are entering into a matter that contains problems and problems. Her worries and the marriage of a divorced woman to a dead man in a dream are evidence of her despair of something she seeks, and her ex-husband’s brother shows that he bears her responsibility. Hugging a divorced woman in a dream is evidence that the dreamer stands by others in times of adversity, and whoever sees that he is kissing a divorced woman in a dream, this means that he offers benefits. And advice for others. Seeing a divorced woman in a dream: A divorced wife in a dream indicates the return of memories with her. Whoever sees that he is having intercourse with his divorced wife in a dream, it is one of the obsessions of the soul, and dreaming of living with a divorced woman indicates longing and longing for her, and if he sees that you are flirting with her. Your ex-wife in a dream indicates deprivation of her rights and deception, and seeing your ex-wife committing adultery in a dream indicates the corruption of her morals and actions. Whoever sees his divorced wife sad in a dream, this indicates her bad condition after him, and seeing a divorced woman sick in a dream means turmoil in her affairs and she will face obstacles in all her actions, and the dream of a divorced woman. A woman crying shows that her worries and sorrows have passed. Seeing a divorced woman getting married in a dream means the end of the relationship with her, and whoever sees his divorced wife pregnant in a dream, this indicates the greatness of her worries, bearing great responsibilities, and dreaming of childbirth. From the ex-wife indicates her release from sadness and the end of her suffering. The dream of talking to the divorced wife indicates communication between them and perhaps reprimanding her, and if you see that your divorced wife wants to return in a dream, this indicates her strong remorse. Interpretation of seeing the ex-wife in a dream. Seeing the mother of the divorced woman in a dream. Seeing the mother of a divorced wife in a dream indicates a lot of gossip and false talk if the dreamer does not agree with her, and whoever sees his mother

title: Interpretation of a dream about giving birth to twins

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the birth of twins in a dream: It is considered one of the common dreams at this time, as the birth of twins requires mental and physical effort, and you can read about escaping in a dream and the frequent birth of twins in general due to the appearance of many stimulants for women. At this time. Read also: Penguin in a dream. Interpretation of seeing the birth of twins in a dream. Interpretation of seeing the birth of twins in a dream. Interpretation of seeing the birth of twins in a dream. Newborn babies in a dream indicate getting rid of the problems and fears that attack you, and that God Almighty will end your anxiety and distress, and that life gives you an opportunity. To change your life. Life is for the better and gives you luck and happiness. Interpretation of carrying newborn twins in your arms in a dream, this indicates that you will make good and decisive decisions to solve complex issues and the people who coexist with you appreciate your abilities and skills to overcome all difficult problems and end your crises. Read also: Washing the dead Interpretation of a dream about giving birth to twins If You dreamed of giving birth to twins in a dream, this means that there is a promise of good news that will change your life for the better. The interpretation of this vision is one of the ambiguous interpretations of giving birth to twins in a dream. If the dreamer’s life goes better, his success will increase and multiply and he will achieve a luxurious life without problems in your life. Interpretation of seeing a girl Breastfeeding twins in a dream about a girlSeeing a girl breastfeeding twins in a dream indicates an inner desire to take care of a number of life situations and decisions and asks you to make a choice. Breastfeeding twins during one period indicates happiness soon in your life. Read also: Seeing 500 riyals in a dreamInterpretation of a vision Twins in a dream for a married woman after giving birthIf a married woman dreams of twins after giving birth, this means that she will be placed in an important position, it is an appointment, a period of great maturity. It can symbolize two paths in life and that you need more enthusiasm to move forward and pay more attention to your life. Dreaming of twins with adult girls in a dream indicates insecurity and that you need to think a lot to understand the problems that need to be solved. Interpretation of seeing twin girls who are different in shape and sizeAs we all know that twins are generally identical in all genes, but there may be twins who differ in shape And size, this dream may be showing that there is a contradiction in two things and you cannot choose between them out of confusion and you are forced to choose two people to continue life with. Therefore, the late twin indicates that you are suffering from conflicts of choice and you need stability in your life even on days that require you to change everything. Something. Interpretation of seeing the birth of twins in a dream for a married woman indicates the expectation of meeting with people you have not seen for a long time in your life. title: Interpretation of a dream about a pig for a single woman and a married woman, Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a pig for singles and married people according to Ibn Sirin. There are a large number of animals on the surface of the planet in the environment in which we live, and among these animals is the pig. The name of this animal refers to a book from the Holy Qur’an, according to His Majesty’s saying: {Indeed, He is bestowed upon you. The exotic country is considered an animal wealth, as it benefits it with its meat, skin, and hair, and many would like to obtain all the information revolving around the subject of the answer to the interpretation of a dream about a pig for single people and married people. Ibn Sirin, and its interpretation follows. And seeing it in reality is one of the hateful things, and the following is an answer to the interpretation of seeing a pig in a dream for an unmarried woman: An unmarried girl who sees a pig in her sleep is one of the unpleasant dreams that indicate that there is an evil, cunning person close to her life who is trying to trap her, and this dream is a sign To warn him. And whoever sees in her dream that there is a pig running after her, then this dream shows the girl’s intense fear of envy, and even removes her appetite for envy of her, restricting prayer, reciting the Holy Qur’an, and insisting on reciting the surah. The cow. And the girl who sees herself in a dream eating pork and she knows it, and this dream indicates that the girl is far from God, Blessed and Most High, and is committing immoral acts, and this dream is a sign for her until she repents. To God in sincere repentance. As for the one who does not know that it is pork and eats it, this dream indicates the presence of an evil friend in her life, who is trying hard to spoil her reputation among the people, and this dream came to her. To warn her. And the girl who lives in an emotional state and saw in a dream that she saw a pig walking next to her lover, this dream showed that he is a cunning and manipulative person who is trying to enjoy his time with her and will never marry her by her parents as promised. title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing the desert in a dream by Ibn Sirin in detail

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about seeing the desert in a dream by Ibn Sirin in detail, where seeing the desert in a dream means sadness, anguish, and anxiety. Details.Seeing the desert in a dream for a single woman: A dream about seeing the desert in a dream. If a single woman sees the desert in her dream, this means that she will enter a new world, whether professionally or jointly with her partner. And if she sees herself standing alone in the desert, this means that she feels lonely. In her normal life, and if she finds water in that desert or sees green agriculture, this means that she will communicate with the person she loves or desires. . Going on a trip will be happy. If she sees snakes when she sees the desert in a dream, this means that she will create some problems in her work or personal life. Seeing the desert in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees the desert in a dream, this means that there are new people who will enter her life They treat her badly, and therefore she must be cared for and cared for. If she sees a snake in this desert, this indicates that she is facing some problems with her husband or friends and she must think of solutions for them. Money. If a married woman finds water in the desert, this indicates that she will give birth to good children, but if she sees herself walking alone in the desert, this indicates that she is living in an unhappy marriage or wants a divorce. Seeing the desert in a dream for a pregnant woman: She dreams of seeing the desert In a dream, if a pregnant woman sees the desert in a dream, she has water, and this indicates that her birth will be easy and the child is healthy. If she sees herself walking alone in the desert, this indicates that there are some problems in her life that will affect the psyche and her child. Seeing the desert in a dream for a man: dreaming Seeing the desert in a dream If a single man sees the desert in his dream, this means that he will have a good wife, especially if you are in the desert where flowers are grown and they look beautiful. If a married man sees the desert in a dream, this means that he is looking for change, and if he has problems with his wife, this means That he will find a solution to these problems and enjoy comfort and peace with his wife and children. After solving these problems, he can take his wife on a pleasant trip after solving them. Dreaming of seeing the desert in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Dreaming of seeing the desert in a dream, if one sees the desert in his dream and plants flowers, this indicates He will get a lot of money after the exhaustion and effort that this person will make. He saw the same man walking in this desert and was happy, and this indicates that his life with its people is good and happy. If a person dreams that he is lost in a great desert, this indicates that he feels lonely. He needs people beside him to share his life and dreams. Seeing walking in the desert in a dream Seeing the desert in a dream indicates difficulties in life Seeing someone walking in the desert with someone means that his feeling of loneliness will go away Walking alone in the desert and feeling hungry also shows one’s isolation and constant search for blue and money A pregnant woman who dreams that she is pregnant

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing makeup in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about seeing makeup in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Reliance on makeup and cosmetics has become very dependent on girls over the years. Some girls do this makeup. In this context, we explain to you the meanings of the dream interpretation of seeing makeup in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of seeing makeup in a dream by Ibn Sirin The use of makeup varies from one woman to another and from one woman to another, and the amount used varies according to the occasion for which it is applied, as daytime makeup is light compared to makeup. Evening. And wedding party makeup, which is characterized by its bright and bright colors, but what is the interpretation of seeing makeup in a dream, and here we show you the interpretation of the dream of seeing makeup in a dream by Ibn Sirin: According to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, wearing makeup in a dream means that you have fallen into problems and are facing many difficult disputes. While wearing a lot of makeup in a dream to hide facial features, its interpretation is the dreamer’s cunning and deception, as well as his bad reputation. Also, seeing an unmarried woman wearing makeup in a dream indicates the approach of marriage, in addition to constantly thinking about this matter. While buying Makeup in a dream indicates the high status that the dreamer will achieve. Makeup in a man’s dream is news of halal food for him. While wiping off makeup in a dream brings with it a lot of goodness and happiness for the dreamer. It also indicates the emergence of major changes in the dreamer’s life and will be a reason for his happiness. See also the interpretation of the dream of seeing a scarf in a dream in detail. Makeup in a dream is good news for a free woman. Many girls and women resort to makeup for decorative purposes, especially at weddings and happy occasions. Makeup in a dream is good news for single women. Here are the details: Wearing makeup in her dream indicates a high position that she will reach. Makeup in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, shows strength of character, as well as the ability to bear difficult responsibilities. While an unmarried woman in a dream is trying to beautify herself and putting on makeup in front of a woman indicates cunning, bad morals and religion. The vision is a warning of bad company. If she An unmarried woman wearing a lot of makeup in a dream means that she will suffer from psychological damage. Perhaps the vision indicates the disclosure of hidden secrets. In addition, makeup in a dream for single people indicates marriage to a person who has good morals, as well as one who is well-off. While beautification indicates In the dream also indicates piety and closeness to God Almighty through good deeds. But if an unmarried woman runs away with her makeup in her dream, this is good news for relief and compensation from God. With regard to Imam Al-Sadiq’s interpretation, putting roe in an unmarried woman’s dream is evidence of a weak character. And also her inability to bear responsibility. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a sun in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about a makeup box for a married woman. The symbol of makeup in a married woman’s dream is considered one of the good symbols, as it carries associations

title: Interpretation of dreams about urine mixing with blood for unmarried women

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream of urine mixing with blood for a single or married woman. It is one of the dreams that raises anxiety and fear in the viewer. Blood is one of the media present in the bodies of humans and animals, and there is no living being that is devoid of it, as it helps supply the blood vessels with nutritional needs and helps rid them of toxins. And when we see it in a dream, it indicates many different and multiple interpretations and indicators, some of which indicate goodness and others portend evil. Interpretation of dreams about mixing urine with blood for one woman, the scholar Ibn Sirin, may God have mercy on him, explained in his book specialized in the world of dream interpretation so that others can benefit from it on all occasions, and from During the points in the following paragraph we will explain the interpretation of dream interpretation. A dream about urine and blood in this: If an unmarried girl sees urine mixed with blood in her dream, this is a sign and evidence that she will be exposed to a disease that she will suffer from for some time. This dream also suggests that she is committing many of the sins, transgressions, and taboos that this girl does in her life until this A sign for her. Another sign is the collapse of anxiety and the end of problems, but when she sees herself urinating in the toilet. However, if she sees herself urinating and blood is dripping on her clothes, this is evidence of her reckless behavior that makes herself a victim of everyone. As for seeing her urinating in front of those she knows or does not know, This is a sign that her secrets will be discovered in the near future. Interpretation of a dream of urine and blood for a married woman: This dream is one of those dreams that indicate and suggest many different things about a married woman, but they are neither good nor bad. This is what the famous imams Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi and others explained in their books, and these interpretations came as follows: If a married woman sees this dream and feels a severe burning, this is an indication that she will suffer from a disease in her reproductive system and may need surgery, and God is Great and All-Knowing. This is an indication and evidence of Some disgraceful and bad qualities of the person who sees it, such as miserliness, gossip, and revealing the secrets of others. It also indicates the responsibility that the person who has the vision bears and experiences in the previous or current period, and that she is trying with every effort to get rid of it so that she can enjoy comfort and peace of mind. And if she is suffering from accumulated debts and sees these The vision, this is good news and relief for her ruling on paying off her debts, God willing. And when she sees herself urinating in the fire and feels severe and intense pain, this means that one of her children will get sick. See also: Interpretation of a dream about joy in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen. Interpretation of a dream of urine and blood for a man. Also, this dream It does not indicate or indicate good interpretations and connotations for the man, as the interpretation comes according to the dream that he saw in detail, and below we will explain that to you in every detail as follows: If a man, whether married or unmarried, sees his urine red in color, this indicates two things, the first That he will suffer a major loss in his money and current work, and the second is that the viewer is suffering from it. An illness that leaves him bedridden for some time. There is another interpretation of this dream

title: Interpretation of a dream about hugging someone in a dream

preview.html: A dream about hugging someone in a dream. A hug is a strong emotion that conveys a feeling of love and warmth, so a girl is always looking for an interpretation to dream that she is hugging someone she loves for single people, and this is because of the many dreams she dreams. From one person to another depending on the viewer's situation. If a single girl sees that she is hugging someone she knows or a colleague, this may indicate that the girl wants to communicate with this person. It means the elimination of worry and pain, safety and security, and the disappearance of fear, anxiety and tension. Interpretation of seeing someone I know hugging a single woman in a dream This vision is one of the dreams that do not fear, because it carries within it an abundance of kindness, tenderness and love. It is one of the dreams that has been interpreted by many scholars such as Muhammad Ibn Sirin Ibn Shaheen and Al-Nabulsi. It explains a lot of love and focus in the mind of a person whom you may want to encounter a lot in reality. Dreaming of a human chest in a dream is considered one of the good dreams that send a lot of happiness and goodness to the dreamer, as it expresses security, love and trust. It is also possible that it indicates Interpretation of hugging a person means dealing with this person, but this person should not be trusted. Seeing a girl hugging someone she knows in a dream means that she wants to be emotionally attached to someone. If she is thinking about him all the time and wants to think about him, this is an indication that she is already thinking about him In addition to the interpretation of the hug, it expresses to the girl in a dream the closeness, love, and affection of someone she seems to know closely. Interpretation of seeing someone I know hugging a married woman. Dreaming of someone’s breasts in a dream. Seeing breasts in a dream of someone he did not know before in a dream, this is a sign of the dreamer. A lot of time will pass until acquaintance and rapprochement between him and this person. Seeing a familiar face hugging a married woman is a sign of respect, affection, love and closeness to that person. Seeing a married woman showing that she is hugging her husband, this is a sign of the romance and intense love that the woman feels towards her husband. In reality.Interpretation of a dream about hugging a pregnant woman in a dream. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is hugging someone she knows, this is an indication that this person will receive the support that he will resort to. Dreaming of a person’s breasts in a dream if she has not had a relationship with him before, this is considered good news. Pleasant for her. It also brings news that shows happiness that she will give birth safely and will receive support in life. And if they see that she is embracing her husband, this is evidence of his attitude towards her during pregnancy and childbirth. Interpretation of a dream about hugging a man in a dream If a man sees in his dream that he is embracing someone with whom he is connected A relationship, in reality he is confident in this person and gives him great security over his money and himself. Interpretation of dreams about hugging someone I know and crying for single people. Seeing a hug in a girl’s dream means good luck and hearing news that makes her happy. If an unmarried girl sees that she is crying in the arms of a stranger, This indicates the loss of tension, pain, success, good luck, and the end of the problem that concerns her. It also indicates an improvement in this girl’s condition and an improvement in her psychological state. Seeing the girl is a sign of
